title: A synchronziation event between the Sysmika Portal and the MercadoLibre platform
description: The schema holds information about the user that initiated the transaction on the Sysmika Portal, and the information that will be sent to MercadoLibre

PublicId.description: Transaction Id. Used to identify transactions on both the Sysmika ERP and the Sysmika SDK

Payload.description: Data that will be sent to MercadoLibre

PublisherId.description: User Id on the MercadoLibre platform. This user will be used to publish the product
